text: Good Cider is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * James Levering - The Squire * Ben Walker - Zeke * Billy Bowers - Hank * Oliver Hardy - Hiram (as Babe Hardy) * Julia Calhoun - Aunt Jane ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==References== ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:1914 short films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: Good Cider
